CustomField.description: If one or more response mapping rule has "Execute Sync Enabled" set to true, this flag is set to true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enabling this option allows for synchronous calculation of the survey score when a responder submits the survey. Please note that this may result in a slight delay as the score calculation takes place. If disabled, the score calculation will be performed in the background after the survey is submitted.
CustomField.label: Execute Synchronous Scoring
